img_text: PAR NT.GER Daily Mail Alexis Sanchez hoping PSG offer him a way out of Manchester United 11 Hours Ageo Rumor Alexis Sanchez From: Man Utd To: PSG Alexis Sanchez is growing disillusioned at Old Trafford after losing his place and Jose Mourinho publicly criticising him. His representatives have been sounding out suitors ahead of January.
